sense.name: be worthy of
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[recipient] DESERVE VP NP1[recipient] DESERVE NP2[theme]
sense.examples: The fans deserved a chance to see closure to these stories. Magdi deserved the best songwriter award for her beautiful song! Who else deserved to represent the Cowboys in the Pro Bowl? I agree that Apolo and Julianne deserved to win.

sense.name: warrant, merit, be cause for
sense.examples: The situation deserved a more cautious approach. I felt bad for the guy, but also felt that the whole thing deserved a laugh. Many public officials' reputations and actions deserved a thorough airing and discussion. We must decide if the new perspective and associated actions deserved to be included in future.
